title: FULL-TIME Virtual Assistant – Data, Marketing Campaigns, ChatGPT, Excel, Automation
job_overview:
Are you detail-oriented, tech-savvy, and love improving systems — while thinking a few steps ahead?

We’re hiring a Full-Time Virtual Assistant to manage and improve real estate marketing campaigns, support automation tools, and keep our data clean and effective. If you’re thoughtful, dependable, and love improving systems — we’ll take care of you for the long run.

Our last hire stayed nearly a decade, and we’re looking for someone who wants to build the next chapter with us.

We value teaUpgrade to see actual infombers who think critically, spot inefficiencies, and share well-thought-out ideas. Your input will always be welcome.

What You’ll Do:

Set up seller & buyer lead campaigns (lists, skip tracing, texting, email)
Upload/manage data using Skipify, SmarterContact, MyStrika
Track campaign results and KPIs via Google Sheets
Use Zapier, ChatGPT, Podio, Gmail, and CallRail to streamline operations
Support developers by helping set up platform access and workflows
Spot duplicates, DNC flags, bad numbers, and troubleshoot delivery issues
Collaborate with the team and work independently with ownership
Share clear, respectful suggestions when you see opportunities to improve systems or data logic
Tools You’ll Use:

Smarter Contact – SMS campaigns
Skipify – Skip tracing
MyStrika – Email outreach
Zapier, ChatGPT, Google Sheets, Excel, Podio, CallRail
Requirements:

Strong internet and focused home setup
ID score of 70+, English Level 4+
Strong logic, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills
Excellent written English — clear and professional
Self-starter who can follow structured workflows and think outside the box
Comfortable learning new systems quickly
Schedule:

Full-time (40 hrs/week)
Must be available 8 AM–12 PM EST (U.S. Eastern Time)
Remaining hours flexible as long as tasks are completed on time
Compensation & Benefits:

Base salary: $375 bi-weekly
$100 bonus per deal completed
Paid time off for major U.S. holidays and select Philippine holidays
Training provided by our outgoing VA of 9 years
Stable, long-term role with real growth opportunities
How to Apply:
Step 1 – Fill out the application form:
Upgrade to see actual info

Step 2 – Reply to this job post with the subject line:
“I’m your next data + marketing assistant!”
Include your OnlineJobs.ph profile link.

Why You’ll Love Working With Us:
We believe in clarity, efficiency, and respect.
You won’t be micromanaged — we trust you to deliver and improve.
You’ll get structure and systems, but we also want your ideas.

We reward initiative, results, and reliability — not just busywork.
If you’re the type who sees better ways to do things and can back it up with logic — we’ll give you space to grow and contribute.
